Name: It's Fun To Break Things
About the game: It's Fun To Break Things is the best way to escape as you smash everything in your vicinity to pieces. Be a 'bull in a china shop' and aim for the high score as you progress through the levels. Offered up in virtual reality this will really get you moving. Now released in closed beta! This game includes 10 playable levels and over 60 objects for you to smash. Complete level 10 and have your total score added to our high scores list where you can compete with your friends to see who is the master of destruction. This game is being sold as Early Access and does not reflect the quality of the final product or promise more than its current form. Future updates although planned are not guaranteed.
